name: agent-smith
description: An Agent-based Simulation Service (ASS) for crowds.

scripts.build:domain: npm run build && npm run typedoc
scripts.patch-release: npm run build && npm version patch --force -m "Patch release" && npm run publish
scripts.minor-release: npm run build && npm version minor --force -m "Minor release" && npm run publish
scripts.major-release: npm run build && npm version major --force -m "Major release" && npm run publish
scripts.publish: git commit package.json -m "version bump" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
